title: Scammer_Sara_Leppaenen
author: Scammer_Sara_Leppaenen
content: Are there any news about the scammer Sara Leppänen?Looking forward to get her home address.Enjoy your weekend.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Scammer_Sara_Leppaenen on December 03, 2023, 06:16:32 AMAre there any news about the scammer Sara Leppänen?Looking forward to get her home address.Enjoy your weekend.Personal data of scammers can only be disclosed on the Investigations board, which I think is available to fullmember+, so I think you need to prove that she is a scammer before mods moves the topic to that board.EDIT:I found that you already have a topic there and it seems that you are trolling. In general, whatever the reason, this topic should be locked and the discussion should continue in the other topic.
